changeSet.author: Shruthi P

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM location_tag where name='Appointment Location';

changeSet.comment: Add Appointment Location Tag if not already added.
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO location_tag (name, description, creator, date_created, uuid) VALUES ('Appointment Location', 'When a user user creates a appointment service and chooses a location, they may only choose one with this tag', 1, now(), uuid());

changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE appointment_service ADD COLUMN color varchar(8) NULL AFTER duration_mins;

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT count(*) FROM provider_attribute_type where name='Available for appointments';

changeSet.comment: Adding provider attribute type for Appointments
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO provider_attribute_type (name, description, datatype, min_occurs, creator, date_created, retired, uuid) VALUES ('Available for appointments','providers will be available for appointments', 'org.openmrs.customdatatype.datatype.BooleanDatatype', 0, 1, NOW(), false, UUID());

changeSet.author: Suman

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = 'atomfeed.publish.eventsForAppointmentService';

changeSet.comment: Adding global property to act as switch for raising appointment service events

column.name: description
column.value: If set true, events related to appointment service changes are published

changeSet.author: Suman

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = 'atomfeed.event.urlPatternForAppointmentService';

changeSet.comment: Adding global property to specify the URL pattern for published appointment service events

column.name: description
column.value: URL pattern to use for published appointment service events. Default is /openmrs/ws/rest/v1/appointment-services/{uuid}. If you change default value, please add your custom implementation for the given URL

changeSet.author: Suman

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = 'atomfeed.publish.eventsForAppointments';

changeSet.comment: Adding global property to act as switch for raising appointment events

column.name: description
column.value: If set true, events related to appointment changes are published

changeSet.author: Suman

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = 'atomfeed.event.urlPatternForAppointments';

changeSet.comment: Adding global property to specify the URL pattern for published appointment events

column.name: description
column.value: URL pattern to use for published appointment events. Default is /openmrs/ws/rest/v1/appointments/{uuid}. If you change default value, please add your custom implementation for the given URL

changeSet.comment: Migrating appointment provider to appointment_provider table

changeSet.author: Saikumar, Neha

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = 'Manage Own Appointments';

changeSet.comment: Add Manage Own Appointments privilege to manage own appointments only.

column.name: description
column.value: With this privilege, providers can book/edit appointments only for themselves.

changeSet.author: Saikumar, Sowmika

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = 'Reset Appointment Status';

changeSet.comment: Add Reset Appointment Status privilege to reset appointments from any status to scheduled.

column.name: description
column.value: With this privilege, users can reset appointments from any status to scheduled.

changeSet.author: Dubey

preConditions.sqlCheck: select count(*) from global_property where property='bahmni.appointments.runningOnOpenMRS'

changeSet.comment: Adding 'bahmni.appointments.runningOnOpenMRS' global property to figure out instance type

column.name: description
column.value: If set to yes, the appointments ui will run independent of bahmni core

changeSet.author: Vinay, Alekhya
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE patient_appointment_occurrence ( patient_appointment_timings_id INT, patient_appointment_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_appointment_timings_id) REFERENCES patient_appointment_recurring_time(patient_appointment_timings_id), FOREIGN KEY (patient_appointment_id) REFERENCES patient_appointment(patient_appointment_id));

changeSet.author: Sneha, Alekhya
Sukreet

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM privilege WHERE privilege = 'Appointments: Invite Providers';

changeSet.comment: Add Schedule Appointments privilege to manage own appointments only.

column.name: description
column.value: With this privilege, providers can invite others to an appointment

changeSet.author: Sowmika, Bindu

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM global_property where property = 'atomfeed.event.urlPatternForRecurringAppointments';

changeSet.comment: Adding global property to specify the URL pattern for published appointment events

column.name: description
column.value: URL pattern to use for published Recurring appointment events. Default is /openmrs/ws/rest/v1/recurring-appointments?uuid={uuid}. If you change default value, please add your custom implementation for the given URL

changeSet.author: Deedee Lee

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM person_attribute_type where name = 'email';

changeSet.comment: Add email address in registration page
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO person_attribute_type (name, description, format, searchable, creator, date_created, retired, uuid) VALUES ('email', 'Email Address', 'java.lang.String', '1', 1, now(), false, uuid());

changeSet.author: aojwang
changeSet.comment: Default the date an appointment was issued to the appointment date_created
changeSet.sql: update patient_appointment set date_appointment_scheduled = date_created where date_appointment_scheduled is null;
